title: Kindred ulti bug with teleport (summoner spell)

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So, I started playing Kindred top for awhile now and a strange bug occurded to me twice, whenever I spam my ulti during a teleport it will go on cooldown HOWEVER the lamp's respite doesn't appear anywhere on the map, neither on my previous location nor where i teleported to.
In the link u can see how my ulti goes on cooldown and doesn't appear top or at blue buff.
